heading: Engineering with a Product Mindset
subheading: Based in Pakistan, working with the world.
bio: I have spent the last 7 years navigating the full lifecycle of web development, evolving from a versatile freelancer into a specialized Senior Frontend Engineer.

My approach is rooted in ownership. Having managed my own practice and led distributed teams, I understand that a high-performance UI is only as good as the business logic and architecture supporting it.
Today, I focus on building scalable web systems using React and Next.js, acting as the technical bridge between client vision, design integrity, and production-ready code.

highlights.title: Design-Led Engineering
highlights.description: A 'multipotentialite' background in Graphic Design and Content Writing allows me to bridge the gap between aesthetics and code with true UI/UX empathy.

highlights.title: Strategic Communication
highlights.description: Expertise in managing international stakeholders and translating complex technical roadmap into clear, actionable business outcomes.

highlights.title: High-Growth Adaptability
highlights.description: Proven ability to hit a stride quickly and deliver dependable results even when project requirements are evolving or incomplete.
